responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: That was a rhetorical question. I know the base flooded, intern.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Remember? Of course I remember.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: I was cleaning the lunch dishes and heard a horrible grinding sound, like someone was tearing through metal with their nails.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: I was in my pod before the alarms could even sound.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: Oh, don't give me that look.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: Better to be prepared than dead.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: Man, look at the state of this place. I wish Jacob was here to help clean up.

choices: I can help clean, I don't mind.
Jacob? I mean he was in HQ... I don't see how he'd be of much help though. He's a little... small.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Pfft, you, help clean? Intern, you'd just get in the way!

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Jacob may not be food-safety certified, but he at least would know what to do.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Just cause I'm an intern doesn't make me useless.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Besides, it's your responsibility to teach me.

responses.name: You
responses.text: And now I'm just confused. How is that little robot going to help you clean?

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Not him! Ugh... I mean the scientist? The one you're studying under?

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Works on mapping the underseas terrain... don't tell me you never crossed paths with him.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Sorry, I've been a bit busy with learning the layout of the ship... and emptying the place of water...

responses.name: You
responses.text: ...and fighting off giant crabs.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Well, I suppose things have been a bit stressful. And he has been a bit scare the past few weeks.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Now, how about I see if I can scrounge you up a snack and you tell me more about those crabs.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: You mean Lil Jacob? I'm not talking about that annoying robot.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: I mean the scientist that you studied with.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Oh...

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: He maps the ocean floor? Has a passion for languages? Come on, get your shit together intern.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Working on it...

responses.name: You
responses.text: Though it's hard when you're trying to make sure the base isn't being destroyed by a massive flood.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Anyway, you could be a little nicer to me. I just cleared your kitchens of five giant crabs.

responses.name: You
responses.text: ...Chef.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: You're right. I apologize.

responses.name: Darryl
responses.text: Now, crabs you say...tell me about that.

story.name: You
story.text: Not much to say really. I opened the doors and was accosted by them.

story.name: You
story.text: They pinched at me with their sharp claws. Some of them were almost four foot across! I'm actually lucky to be alive.

story.name: You
story.text: Unfortunately this is becomming a trend...

story.name: You
story.text: Anyway, I picked up one of your kitchen knives and was able to fight them off to get to the valve.

story.name: You
story.text: Oh, speaking of, you can have this back.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: You may as well hang onto that.

story.name: Darryl
story.text: Well intern, I have a favor to ask..
